1.Title: Video Proof
1.Description: Your completion requires video proof, no exceptions. If this rule is violated your submission will be declined.

2.Title: Only YouTube or Medal
2.Description: We will only accept YouTube or Medal links as proof. The video must contain the entire level, start to finish.

3.Title: Cheat Indicator
3.Description: You must have cheat indicator on at all times during the record video. If there is no cheat indicator, the submission will be declined.

4.Title: Custom Ingame-Resources
4.Description: If your resource pack modifies the look of any objects or textures (blocks, spikes, etc.) related to the level itself, your submission will be declined.

5.Title: Blacklisted Modifications
5.Description: All types of botting/macro mods (yBot, zBot, etc.) as well as replay features of mod menus are blacklisted.

6.Title: Pirated Game Copies
6.Description: Pirated versions of Geometry Dash of any kind, from any source, will get your submission declined.
